Raw food diet: Embrace a raw food diet, consuming fruits, vegetables, nuts, and seeds without cooking them.
Fermentation: Focus on fermenting foods, such as pickles, kimchi, and sauerkraut, which can be prepared without cooking equipment.
Outdoor cooking: Cook food outdoors using a portable grill or a camping stove.
One-pot meals: Prepare one-pot meals that can be cooked on a single burner or in a single pot.
Baking: Use a solar oven or a makeshift oven made from materials like cardboard boxes and aluminum foil to bake food.
